title: Can I get back to honor lvl 2 before the end of this season?
body: Right now i'm honor lvl 1 at the second checkpoint how much will it take me to get back to lvl 2 and how many games will I have to play.

replies.body: No one can give you an exact number. With that said, there is still 40+ days until season end I believe. So, while it might be close; you could potentially make it depending on how often you play.

Probably atleast 2 weeks.
If you donâ€™t lower it at all or 1 week if you are a good support.
If play 6 hours a day, 12 games a day, you could maybe get honor lvl 2 before the season ends in 40 days.
